channel.title: [RELEASE] Arcanian War Axe + Arcanian GreatSword [RELEASE]
channel.description:
I am modeling like for 2 days now (started 2 days ago), and i think that my models are good enought to get released!
[u][b]Arcanian GreatSword:[/b][/u] [url=http://uppit.com/v/CRLUF3RB]http://uppit.com/v/CRLUF3RB[/url]
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/8109/guardian2.png[/img]
[u][b]Arcanian War Axe:[/b][/u] [url=http://uppit.com/v/66W9LD5B]http://uppit.com/v/66W9LD5B[/url]
[img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/917/waraxeofarcanian.png[/img] [img]http://img260.imageshack.us/img260/5057/waraxeofarcanian4.png[/img]
[u][b] In game:[/b][/u] [img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/7927/axex.png[/img]
[img]http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/1430/swordh.png[/img]
* Models are gziped and ready for your client. * Ints are included in the .rar file!
-EXTRA-
Wireframe of Greatsword:[url=http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4948/guardian3.png]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4948/guardian3.png[/url] Wireframe of War Axe: [url=http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/2053/waraxeofarcanian2.png]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/2053/waraxeofarcanian2.png[/url]

item.title: [RELEASE] Arcanian War Axe + Arcanian GreatSword [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

Where do I put the ints at? And if I make my own model I just make a random number up, like whip is if(i == 4151){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = [Ljava.lang.String;@995665;
class8.aString170 = Abyssal whip;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A weapon from the abyss.”.getBytes();
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0];
class8.anInt174 = 5412;//Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 840;
class8.anInt190 = 280;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 56;
class8.anInt165 = 5409;//Male Wield View
class8.anInt200 = 5409;//Female Wield View
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;,

you just change the 4151 or the 5409 to like 10003? then where do you put the ints, I know how to put the model where it goes, but how do you make it so you are not changing a dragon scimmy to something else. For instant, I made dragons scimmy look different, I don’t want to change the normal dragon scimmy so I change the 4151 in the ints to something else? Then do the same for the models, then I put the ints where??

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Arcanian War Axe + Arcanian GreatSword [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

wanbliscape:

how do you know what the spawning code is for it, like sometimes u can make a bronze scimmy into lookin like a green dragon scimmy or something but how do you know what the id is???

Well for exapme this is the the INT for Greatsword:
if(i == 10003)// <— THIS NUMBER IS THE ::Pickup ##### 1
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];//menu
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//menu option
class8.anInt174 = 14007;//inventory/drop model
class8.anInt181 = 2300;//Model Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 1535;//rotation 1
class8.anInt198 = 1778;//rotation 2
class8.anInt169 = 0;//model offset 1
class8.anInt194 = 0;//model offset 2
class8.anInt165 = 14006;//male wield ModelId
class8.anInt200 = 14006;//female wield ModelId
class8.anInt188 = -1;//female sleeve
class8.anInt164 = -1;//male sleeve
class8.aString170 = “Arcanian GreatSword”;//name
class8.aByteArray178 = “This is the Arcanian GreatSword!”.getBytes();//name
}

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Arcanian War Axe + Arcanian GreatSword [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

you make the id after gzipping

just rename it like 1111

just make sure that you will never use that name for a different model again,

also try to make it something your client isn’t already using, because it just becomes more complicated from messing up a model already working inside your client

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE] Arcanian War Axe + Arcanian GreatSword [RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“The Arcanian, post:26, topic:316522”][quote author=sergiypro link=topic=413084.msg3044142#msg3044142 date=1259353536]
umm i added ur models but for some reason when i wear the great sword i become invisible…
[/quote]
Make sure you type this when your in-game:
Add model 14006
Add model 14007
Add model 14008
Add model 14009[/quote]

Thats not the issue.

@Sergiypro - Your problem is that one model is clashing with another. Try taking off your things, and figuring out what is making you go invisible. Notice, Arcanian’s screenshots are wearing a str-amulet. So, you would not have seen that glitch.

Read full topic
